# Warm Nights (film)

| music                 = Hamada Helal
| producer            = Hassan Ramzy
| released             =
| country              = Egypt
| language            = Arabic
}}
Warm Nights (, transliterated/lit. Al-Layaly al-Dafeâ€™a) is an Egyptian film released in 1961. It stars Sabah, Emad Hamdy, and Poussi.
Cast
* Sabah (Laila)
* Emad Hamdy (Dr. Ahmed Badreddin)
* Poussi
* Zahrat El-Ola (Souad)
* Kamal el-Shennawi (Dr. Amar)
* Negma Ibrahim (Ahmed's mother)
* Thurayya Fakhry
* Ragaa Hussein
* Qadreya Kamel
* Ali Roushdy
External links
* [https://elcinema.com/en/work/1006772 El Cinema page]
* [https://dhliz.com/film/al_layaly_al_dafe2a Dhliz page]
